    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78832</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Naming of hydrocarbons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benennen der Kohlenwasserstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nommer des hydrocarbures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nomear dos hidrocarbonetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chiamando degli idrocarburi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ονομασία των υδρογονανθράκων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nombramiento de hidrocarburos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is second of five illustrations used as examples for the basic rules in naming hydrocarbons. Here, the displayed and skeletal formulae of cyclohexane is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cyclohexane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">display formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrocarbons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">naming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">organic compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prefix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skeletal formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses liegt an zweiter Stelle bei fünf 
Abbildungen, die als Beispiele für die grundlegenden Richtlinien 
benutzt werden, wenn es Kohlenwasserstoffe benennt. Hier wird 
die angezeigten und skelettartigen Formeln des Cyclohexans gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est en second lieu de cinq illustrations 
utilisées comme exemples pour les règles de base en nommant des 
hydrocarbures. Ici, les formules affichées et squelettiques du 
cyclohexane est montrées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é em segundo de cinco ilustrações usadas 
como exemplos para as réguas básicas em nomear hidrocarbonetos. 
Aqui, as fórmulas indicadas e esqueletais do cyclohexane são 
mostradas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è in secondo luogo di cinque illustrazioni 
usate come esempi per le regole di base nel chiamare gli idrocarburi. 
Qui, le formule visualizzate e scheletriche di cicloesano è 
indicata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δεύτερη πέντε απεικονίσεων που 
χρησιμοποιούνται για παραδείγματα για τους βασικούς κανόνες στην 
ονομασία των υδρογονανθράκων. Εδώ, οι επιδειχθέντες και 
σκελετικοί τύποι του κυκλοεξανίου εμφανίζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto está en segundo lugar de cinco 
ilustraciones usadas como ejemplos para las reglas básicas en el 
nombramiento de los hidrocarburos. Aquí, los fórmulas 
visualizados y esqueléticos del cyclohexane se muestran.</string>
          </description>
